duck: Zonal and meridional, directions on a globe
Zonal and poloidal, directions in a toroidal magnetically confined plasma
zonal definition: of, relating to, affecting, or having the form of a zone.

milestones: Over two million people displaced by flooding in India

wiki.text:
'Zonal' can refer to:
* Zonal and meridional, directions on a globe
* Zonal and poloidal, directions in a toroidal magnetically confined plasma
* Zonal polynomial, a symmetric multivariate polynomial
wiki.title: zonal
